DateTools

type
class
available in
neko
The DateTools class contains some extra functionalities for Date manipulation. It's stored in a different class in order to prevent the standard Date of being bloated and thus increasing the size of each application using it.

Static Variables

private DAYS_OF_MONTH : Array<Int>

Static Methods

private date_format(Unknown, Unknown) : Unknown

public days(n : Float) : Float

Convert a number of days to a date-time

public delta(d : Date, t : Float) : Date

Returns a Date which time has been changed by t milliseconds.

public format(d : Date, f : String) : String

Format the date d according to the format f. The format is compatible with the strftime standard format, except that there is no support in Flash and JS for day and months names (due to lack of proper internationalization API). On haXe/Neko/Windows, some formats are not supported.

public getMonthDays(d : Date) : Int

Returns the number of days in a month

public hours(n : Float) : Float

Convert a number of hours to a date-time

public make(o : { seconds : Int, ms : Float, minutes : Int, hours : Int, days : Int}) : Float

Build a date-time from several components

public minutes(n : Float) : Float

Convert a number of minutes to a date-time

public parse(t : Float) : { seconds : Int, ms : Float, minutes : Int, hours : Int, days : Int}

Separate a date-time into several components

public seconds(n : Float) : Float

Convert a number of seconds to a date-time
